import React from 'react'; import './Chat.css'; import { Avatar, IconButton } from '@material-ui/core'; import { SearchOutlined, AttachFile, MoreVert, InsertEmoticon, Mic } from '@material-ui/icons'; function Chat({messages}) { const sendMessage = e => { e.preventDefault } return (

Room name

Last seen at...

{messages.map((message) => (

{message.name} {message.message} {message.timestamp}

))}

Brandon This is a message {new Date().toUTCString()}

) } export default Chat
